title: 在ChatGPT中停用GPT-4o、GPT-4.1、GPT-4.1 mini和OpenAI o4-mini
description: 2026年2月13日，除了先前宣布的GPT-5（即时版、思考版和专业版）将停用外，我们还将在ChatGPT中停用GPT-4o、GPT-4.1、GPT-4.1 mini和OpenAI o4-mini。在API方面，目前暂无变化。
titleZh: 在ChatGPT中停用GPT-4o、GPT-4.1、GPT-4.1 mini和OpenAI o4-mini
titleEn: Disable GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT
descriptionZh: 2026年2月13日，除了先前宣布的GPT-5（即时版、思考版和专业版）将停用外，我们还将在ChatGPT中停用GPT-4o、GPT-4.1、GPT-4.1 mini和OpenAI o4-mini。在API方面，目前暂无变化。
descriptionEn: On February 13, 2026, in addition to the previously announced retirement of GPT-5 (Instant, Think, and Professional), we will also retire GPT-4o, GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and OpenAI o4-mini in ChatGPT.

descriptionZh: AI正在加速与广告的融合，但这场商业化盛宴的背后却是用户信任的透支。
descriptionEn: AI is accelerating its integration with advertising, but behind this commercialization feast lies an overdraft of user trust. Paths differ between China and the US, yet they face the same question: when AI's "thinking" is eroded by commercial logic, what we lose is not just a pure experience, but the last credible cognitive reference frame in the digital age.
